thread.title: Vpn One Click Announces their 5 Stars VPN Service
thread.title_full: Vpn One Click Announces their 5 Stars VPN Service - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Vpn One Click Announces their 5 Stars VPN Service
text:
Vpn One Click allows you to send and receive data through an encrypted point to point connection enjoying full security, privacy and functionality.
 DUBAI, UAE, September 27, Public Wi-Fi and insecure connections are bad news if you value privacy. The solution is to use a VPN. This service uses fast servers around the world to mask your online identity without causing lag.
Vpn One Click is a Virtual Private Network Service that enables you to connect anonymously to any public/shared network. You will be able to send and receive data through an encrypted point to point connection enjoying full security, privacy and functionality (Twitter, Facebook, Youtube, Skype, VoIP and any other Website) by connecting to a VPN Server.
Vpn One Click is a multi platform VPN application for: Windows computer, Linux Computer, Mac computers, iPhone, iPad, iPod; Android tablets/phones, Windows Mobile Tablets/Phones, Play Station 3, X Box 360, Wii Console, Apple Tv, Smart Tv, Amazon Kindle, any other device using Wifi, that can be activated for free with a single click (Android, Windows, Linux) or you can also go through our try it and buy it (Mac, iPhone/iPad, Router).
Servers are available in 29 countries, giving you the possibility of changing your public IP address allowing you to watch your favorite national TV even when you are abroad: USA, Canada, Australia, United Kingdom, Italy, France, Sweden, Germany, Switzerland, Netherlands, Luxembourg, Spain, Bulgaria, Romania, India, Singapore, Egypt, Russia, Turkey, Hong Kong, Japan, Iceland, Mexico, Panama, Chile, Czech, Hungary, Poland and Austria.
The service works all over the world including China.
You can connect up to 10 devices to our Vpn/Wifi Router ( www.B1router.com ) without installing any software.
For more details: http://www.vpnoneclick.com
Kryptotel Fz LLc offers devices, software and services all working together to keep you and your business safe and secure.
